allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add aggressive SEO blog content with 12 articles

Blog articles targeting high-volume keywords:
- Sewa Oxygen Concentrator Malaysia Panduan Lengkap
- Oxygen Concentrator vs Tong Oksigen
- Oxygen Concentrator untuk COPD
- Portable Oxygen for Travel/Umrah/Haji
- Cara Guna Oxygen Concentrator Tutorial
- Oxygen Concentrator vs Nebulizer
- Oxygen Concentrator vs CPAP Machine
- Harga Oxygen Concentrator Malaysia 2024
- COVID-19 Recovery Oxygen Therapy
- Oxygen for Warga Emas (Elderly)
- Kos Elektrik Oxygen Concentrator

Each article includes:
- Featured snippet optimization
- Article + FAQ + HowTo schema markup
- Table of contents for navigation
- Keyword-rich H1, H2, H3 tags
- Internal linking to main pages
- CTA boxes for conversions

Updated sitemap.xml with all blog pages.
Added Blog link to main navigation.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter ''*.html'' | ForEach-Object { \(Get-Content $_FullName -Raw\) -replace ''class=""btn btn-white btn-lg""'', ''class=""btn btn-whatsapp-large""'' | Set-Content $_FullName -NoNewline }")

Bash(powershell -Command "$files = Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter ''*.html''; foreach \($file in $files\) { $content = Get-Content $file.FullName -Raw -Encoding UTF8; $newContent = $content -replace ''class=""btn btn-white btn-lg""'', ''class=""btn btn-whatsapp-large""''; if \($content -ne $newContent\) { Set-Content -Path $file.FullName -Value $newContent -NoNewline -Encoding UTF8 } }")
